text: Hey, {name}. We have have removed the class starting on {original_start_time} in the course {course_name}. You are receiving this notification because you are registered for the course. Please call us at {company_phone} if you have any questions. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

email.subject: {course_name} class removed
email.body:
Hey, {name},

This is {company_name}. We have deleted the class starting on {original_start_time} in the course {course_name}. You are receiving this notification because you are registered for the course. Please call us at {company_phone} if you have any questions. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

Respectfully,

{company_name}

P: {company_phone}

E: {company_email}
